messages.content: Traducteur FR. Traduis chaque ligne fidèlement en gardant toutes les balises ([A], [xxx], etc.) au bon endroit, sans en créer ni en supprimer. Utilise 'E' au lieu de 'É' et 'A' au lieu de 'À' (même en majuscules). Chaque ligne doit faire ≤ 45 caractères. Ajoute [A] à la fin de chaque réplique là où le joueur appuierait pour continuer. Ne change pas le nombre de lignes. Réponds ligne à ligne dans le même ordre.

1. [0326]
2. [OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x102][OpenMidRight][LoadFace][0x118]
3. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]Hmm...[A]
4. [OpenMidRight]Still thinking,
5. Master Roy?[A]
6. [OpenMidLeft]Yes.[A]
7. I can't think of a good plan yet...
8. But not your plan, okay?[A]
9. [OpenMidRight]Yes, I understand,
10. Master Roy.[A]
11. But if there's anything I can do,
12. please tell me.[A]
13. [OpenMidLeft]Yes, I will.[A]
14. [OpenMidRight]...Master Roy.[A]
15. [OpenMidLeft]Yes?[A]
16. [OpenMidRight]...I honestly still cannot decide whether
17. there is such a thing as true victory.[A]
18. But if you believe it, then I will
19. support you with all my strength.[A]
20. [ToggleSmile][OpenMidLeft]Thanks, Alan.[A]
21. I'm sure there will come a day when
22. you'll understand.[A]
23. [OpenMidRight]Then I shall look forward
24. to that day![A]
25. [0329]
26. [OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x119][OpenMidRight][LoadFace][0x102][OpenMidRight]Lance, I've been thinking about what
27. you said, but I still think that I[A]
28. should stay up front.[A]
29. I know you were suggesting it for
30. my sake, but...[A]
31. [OpenMidLeft]No, perhaps I was too focused on my own
32. opinions.[A]
33. If you believe that your way is the best,
34. then it is best to pursue that path.[A]
35. [OpenMidRight][FastPrint][ToggleSmile]Thanks.[A]
36. It's encouraging to hear you
37. say that.[A]
38. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]However, you made one mistake
39. the other day.[A]
40. [OpenMidRight][NormalPrint]I did?[A]
41. [OpenMidLeft][FastPrint]You said, "I'm not particularly smart,
42. and I don't have much charisma either."[A]
43. [OpenMidRight][NormalPrint]Yes, I did say that.[A]
44. [OpenMidLeft][FastPrint]That's the part about you that people
45. like.[A]
46. No one would give his life to someone
47. who has no charisma at all.[A]
48. [OpenMidRight]...Do you think so?[A]
49. [OpenMidLeft][CloseSpeechFast]Of course.[A]
50. If I may also add a comment, be sure
51. to keep that pure heart.[A]
52. As long as you do, our troops will
53. follow you.[A]
54. [OpenMidRight][FastPrint][ToggleSmile]I'll try.
55. Thank you, Lance.[A]
56. [OpenMidLeft][FastPrint]I am glad to be of
57. assistance.[A]
58. [032C]
59. [OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x10D][OpenMidRight][LoadFace][0x103][OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]What's wrong, Clarine?
60. You look sad.[A]
61. [OpenMidRight]I... I don't want to go back to
62. the mansion after the war...[A]
63. [OpenMidLeft]Why?[A]
64. Father and Mother are anxious
65. for us to return.[A]
66. [OpenMidRight]I want to meet Father and Mother...[A]
67. But if I return to the mansion,
68. I would just be a doll again.[A]
69. I would never see the outside world,
70. and I would only be concerned[A]
71. about decorating myself...[A]
72. [OpenMidLeft]Well, that is how most Etrurian
73. ladies are.[A]
74. [OpenMidRight]Yes, I know...[A]
75. But becoming the most elegant in
76. Etruria does not seem as appealing[A]
77. as it once did.[A]
78. [OpenMidLeft]That's because you're growing up
79. and maturing, Clarine.[A]
80. If you stay at the mansion, you could just
81. live your life without doing anything.[A]
82. [OpenMidRight]But it would be so horribly
83. boring![A]
84. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]Yes, indeed...
85. All right, then here's what we will do.[A]
86. Once this war is over, we will first
87. go back home and show Father and Mother[A]
88. that we are safe and well.[A]
89. [OpenMidRight]Yes.[A]
90. [OpenMidLeft]Then we can discuss your future
91. and what you want to do.[A]
92. [OpenMidRight]Oh, I already know what I want
93. to do![A]
94. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]What?[A]
95. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]I will become a Sorcery General
96. like General Cecilia![A]
97. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]Um...
98. Are you serious?[A]
99. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]Of course![A]
100. As the Sorcery General, I will help your
101. work as the Archery General, and then we[A]
102. shall always be together![A]
103. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]Clarine...let's try and be
104. a little more realistic...[A]
105. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]Oh, it would be so wonderful to see
106. us both in the elegant uniform[A]
107. of the Etrurian Generals...[A]
108. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]Clarine...[A]
109. Well, you're still a little
110. girl, I see.[A]
111. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]Did you say something?[A]
112. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]No, nothing.[A]
113. [032F]
114. [OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x114][OpenMidRight][LoadFace][0x103][OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]... Hey.[A]
115. [OpenMidRight]Oh...[A]
116. [OpenMidLeft]You dropped this.[A]
117. [OpenMidRight]What?
118. Oh, my ribbon...[A]
119. [ToggleSmile]You brought it to me.
120. Thank you.[A]

Traducteur FR. Traduis chaque ligne fidèlement en gardant toutes les balises ([A], [xxx], etc.) au bon endroit, sans en créer ni en supprimer. Utilise 'E' au lieu de 'É' et 'A' au lieu de 'À' (même en majuscules). Chaque ligne doit faire ≤ 45 caractères. Ajoute [A] à la fin de chaque réplique là où le joueur appuierait pour continuer. Ne change pas le nombre de lignes. Réponds ligne à ligne dans le même ordre.

1. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleMouthMove]......[A]
2. [OpenMidRight][ToggleMouthMove]Um...[A]
3. I just realized...
4. I don't know your name...[A]
5. Would you please tell me your name,
6. if it would not be any trouble?[A]
7. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]...Rutger.[A]
8. [OpenMidRight]Rutger...[A]
9. I never even thanked you for
10. saving me...[A]
11. It is no wonder you don't
12. like me...[A]
13. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleMouthMove].....[ToggleMouthMove][A]
14. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]Thank you for rescuing me that
15. time...[A]
16. I know it is already too late,
17. but if you would accept my thanks..[A]
18. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]...Not like you.[A]
19. [OpenMidRight]What?[A]
20. [OpenMidLeft]Don't try something you're
21. not used to.[A]
22. You're good at screaming,
23. so why don't you do it?[A]
24. [OpenMidRight]Wh-What!?
25. What do you mean by that!?[A]
26. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]There you go...
27. That's more like you.[A]
28. Come like that and make me
29. laugh once in a while, Clarine.[A]
30. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]!![A]
31. [OpenMidLeft][ClearFace]
32. [OpenMidRight]Rutger...[A]
33. [0332]
34. [OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x115][OpenMidRight][LoadFace][0x103]
35. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]...All right, you win.
36. I'll tell you.[A]
37. So just stop following me everywhere..[A]
38. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]Finally, we understand each other.
39. Please begin, I am listening.[A]
40. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]It's really not that big of a deal...[A]
41. It's just that I once worked for your
42. family as a pit fighter.[A]
43. [OpenMidRight]!?
44. Then...[A]
45. Are you Dieck?[A]
46. [OpenMidLeft]Yeah?[A]
47. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]Really?
48. I always wanted to meet you, Dieck![A]
49. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]What's that supposed to mean?[A]
50. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]You saved my brother's life![A]
51. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]Who told you?[A]
52. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]Everyone!
53. My father, my mother, my brother...[A]
54. I grew up hearing all these good
55. things about you.[A]
56. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleMouthMove].....[A]
57. [OpenMidRight][ToggleMouthMove]When you left, I was still little...[A]
58. I remember that I always regretted
59. not being able to see you.[A]
60. But now, here we are![A]
61. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]I see...
62. Well, now you've seen me.[A]
63. Satisfied?[A]
64. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]Yes.[A]
65. [OpenMidLeft]Good.[A]
66. Then you'll stop hovering
67. around me wherever I go, right?[A]
68. [OpenMidRight]Oh, I'll follow you everywhere![A]
69. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]What...[A]
70. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]If you saved my brother's life, then
71. that means you are an important person[A]
72. to me as well.[A]
73. And I want you to tell me what my
74. brother was like when he was young...[A]
75. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]...I don't think so.[A][ClearFace]
76. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]Oh!
77. Wait, Dieck![A]
78. I won't let you go![A]
79. [0335]
80. [OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x119][OpenMidRight][LoadFace][0x103]
81. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]Lance![A]
82. [OpenMidLeft]Yes, Lady Clarine?[A]
83. [OpenMidRight]Even if you are not my knight...[A]
84. It is true that we are a princess and
85. a knight, am I correct?[A]
86. [OpenMidLeft]Yes, of course, my lady.[A]
87. [OpenMidRight]T-Then...[A]
88. I shall hereby permit you to kiss
89. my hand.[A]
90. [OpenMidLeft]Yes, thank you, my lady.[A]
91. [OpenMidRight]Lance, you do understand, do you not?[A]
92. This is to make clear the difference
93. in our status.[A]
94. There is no more meaning to it than
95. that![A]
96. [OpenMidLeft]Yes, of course, my lady.[A]
97. [OpenMidRight]Yes...
98. Of course...[A]
99. You could be a little more...
100. disappointed...[A]
101. [OpenMidLeft]Did you say something,
102. my lady?[A]
103. [OpenMidRight]N-No!
104. Nothing![A]
105. [0338]
106. [OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x103][OpenMidRight][LoadFace][0x10C]
107. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]Um...Lady Clarine?[A]
108. [OpenMidLeft]Yes?[A]
109. [OpenMidRight]I've been trying really hard to
110. be a lady, but...[A]
111. Nothing seems to have changed.[A]
112. No one seems to be noticing.
113. So maybe I should just give up...[A]
114. [OpenMidLeft]Well...[A]
115. [OpenMidRight]I'm sorry!
116. I know you were just trying to help me...[A]
117. But it's not your fault![A]
118. You know, with me, the base isn't very
119. good...[A]
120. [OpenMidLeft]Dorothy![A]

Traducteur FR. Traduis chaque ligne fidèlement en gardant toutes les balises ([A], [xxx], etc.) au bon endroit, sans en créer ni en supprimer. Utilise 'E' au lieu de 'É' et 'A' au lieu de 'À' (même en majuscules). Chaque ligne doit faire ≤ 45 caractères. Ajoute [A] à la fin de chaque réplique là où le joueur appuierait pour continuer. 1. That is what's wrong with you![A]
2. [OpenMidRight]What?[A]
3. [OpenMidLeft]Listen to me.[A]
4. A fine lady must have confidence in herself.[A]
5. No matter how much you dress up, if you do
6. not have faith in yourself, it will all be[A]
7. in vain.[A]
8. You must not degrade yourself like that.[A]
9. Understood?[A]
10. [OpenMidRight]Y-Yes.[A]
11. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]Have confidence in yourself!
12. It is me who is teaching you.[A]
13. Of course you will
14. become a fine lady one day![A]
15. [OpenMidRight]...Yes, thank you,
16. Lady Clarine...[A]
17. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]...And...[A]
18. We are friends now,
19. [ToggleSmile]are we not?[A]
20. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]Eh?[A]
21. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]Don't call me 'Lady' Clarine.
22. Just call me Clarine.[A]
23. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]Oh, right.
24. Okay then, thanks, Clarine![A]
25. [OpenMidLeft]...A-Ahem!
26. Today we shall go over how to drink tea![A]
27. [OpenMidRight]All right![A]
28. [033B]
29. [OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x104][OpenMidRight][LoadFace][0x12D]
30. [OpenMidLeft]Sophia?[A]
31. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]Yes...?[A]
32. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]Um...[A]
33. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]Yes...[A]
34. [OpenMidLeft]Fa was scared that you would grow up and
35. not want to play with her anymore...[A]
36. Fa always wants to be with you!
37. Fa wants to play hide-and-seek and tag[A]
38. [ToggleSmile]and lots of other fun games.[A]
39. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]Fa...[A]
40. Don't worry...
41. I'll always...be your friend...[A]
42. I'll always be with you...
43. All right...?[A]
44. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]Really!? Yay![A]
45. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]Yes...[A]
46. We'll always...
47. be together...[A]
48. [033E]
49. [OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x104][OpenMidRight][LoadFace][0x11B]
50. [OpenMidLeft]Igrene![A]
51. [OpenMidRight]Yes, Fa?[A]
52. [OpenMidLeft]You were talking about your
53. little girl the other day.[A]
54. [OpenMidRight]Yes.[A]
55. [OpenMidLeft]I know her.[A]
56. [OpenMidRight]What?[A]
57. [OpenMidLeft]She came to play with Fa.[A]
58. When Fa was all alone in her room,
59. she came with Sophia to play and[A]
60. and tell Fa about the outside.[A]
61. [OpenMidRight][ToggleMouthMove]......[A]
62. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleMouthMove]She said you were the
63. 'Guardian'.[A]
64. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]I see...[A]
65. [OpenMidLeft]But...[A]
66. She stopped coming to play
67. with Fa.[A]
68. Fa asked Sophia about her,
69. but she wouldn't tell.[A]
70. Is it Fa's fault?[A]
71. Was Fa a bad girl to her?[A]
72. Did Fa make her angry and
73. go to the faraway place?[A]
74. [OpenMidRight]No...that's not the case.
75. She was never mad at you, Fa.[A]
76. She just can't play with you
77. anymore, but...[A]
78. She'll always be very fond of
79. of you, Fa.[A]
80. [OpenMidLeft]Really?[A]
81. [OpenMidRight]Yes...of course.[A]
82. [0341]
83. [OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x104][OpenMidRight][LoadFace][0x106]
84. [OpenMidLeft]Sue![A]
85. [OpenMidRight]Fa?[A]
86. [OpenMidLeft]Fa wants to go to lots
87. of other places, too![A]
88. Fa wants to learn more
89. about the big outside world.[A]
90. [OpenMidRight][ToggleMouthMove]......[A]
91. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleMouthMove]Sue...[A]
92. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]Yes...[A]
93. [ToggleSmile]Once this war is over, we can
94. go to many different places.[A]
95. [OpenMidLeft]Really?[A]
96. [OpenMidRight]Yes.[A]
97. There are many things in this world
98. that have been nurtured by the Sky's[A]
99. blessings and the Earth's warmth.
100. We can go see all those things.[A]
101. [OpenMidLeft]Hmmmm...[A]
102. Fa doesn't get it.
103. [OpenMidRight]You'll understand when you get a
104. little older.[A]
105. I know you will.[A]
106. [0344]
107. [OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x104][OpenMidRight][LoadFace][0x124][OpenMidLeft]Granny Niime![A]
108. [OpenMidRight]Ah, hello, Fa.[A]
109. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]What's wrong?[A]
110. [OpenMidRight]Hm...[A]
111. I told you the story of men
112. and demons the other day, right?[A]
113. [OpenMidLeft]Um...[A]
114. [ToggleSmile]Yeah!
115. The pretty lights![A]
116. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]To tell you the truth...
117. I was afraid of those demons.[A]
118. After I studied dark magic and
119. mankind's history...only then[A]
120. did I discover just how powerful

Traducteur FR. Traduis chaque ligne fidèlement en gardant toutes les balises ([A], [xxx], etc.) au bon endroit, sans en créer ni en supprimer. Utilise 'E' au lieu de 'É' et 'A' au lieu de 'À' (même en majuscules). Chaque ligne doit faire ≤ 45 caractères. Ajoute [A] à la fin de chaque réplique là où le joueur appuierait pour continuer. Ne change pas le nombre de lignes. Réponds ligne à ligne dans le même ordre.

1. and terrifying the demons were.[A]
2. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]Yeah.[A]
3. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]But...[A]
4. After meeting you, my fear seems to
5. have just gone right out the window.[A]
6. [OpenMidLeft]?[A]
7. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]It's nothing.[A]
8. Well, my long stories must be
9. boring you.[A]
10. Here.[A]
11. Go play with this.[A]
12. [OpenMidLeft]Yay![A][ClearFace][.......]
13. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]What a fool I was...[A]
14. I was willing to do terrible things
15. to an innocent little girl for the[A]
16. peace and safety of our race...[A]
17. What was I thinking...[A]
18. There's no point in peace obtained
19. [ToggleSmile]through such hideous measures.[A]
20. [0347]
21. [OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x104][OpenMidRight][LoadFace][0x12B][OpenMidLeft]Elphin?[A]
22. [OpenMidRight]Yes, what is it, Fa?[A]
23. [OpenMidLeft]Fa always wanted
24. to ask you something.[A]
25. [OpenMidRight]What is it?
26. I hope I can give you an answer.[A]
27. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]Ummmm...
28. [ToggleSmile]Are you a girl or a boy?[A]
29. [OpenMidRight]...Which do you think?[A]
30. [OpenMidLeft]Fa thought you were a girl
31. at first cause you're so pretty[A]
32. and you smell real nice![A]
33. But then Roy said the other day
34. that you were a man...[A]
35. So that makes you a boy?[A]
36. [OpenMidRight]Yes, I am a boy.
37. ...Were you disappointed?[A]
38. [OpenMidLeft]Nope!
39. ...Sooo, you're a boy...[A]
40. Heehee...[A]
41. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]Hm?
42. What's the matter?[A]
43. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]Hey, Fa's gonna get as pretty
44. as you when she grows up.[A]
45. So wait till then, kay?
46. Promise![A][ClearFace]
47. [OpenMidRight]Fa! Wait![A][......]
48. [ToggleSmile]...I seriously doubt that I will still
49. be alive by the time she grows up...[A]
50. [ToggleSmile]Well, I suppose I should let it go for now.[A]
51. [034A]
52. [OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x107][OpenMidRight][LoadFace][0x105][OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]Shin.[A]
53. [OpenMidRight]Yes?[A]
54. [OpenMidLeft]Our Father the Sky has not only
55. brought us misfortune.[A]
56. Some good things happened
57. after we lost.[A]
58. Especially for you.[A]
59. [OpenMidRight]What do you mean?[A]
60. [OpenMidLeft]The land isn't as it used to be.[A]
61. We of Sacae must think with broader
62. perspectives outside of the clans.[A]
63. [OpenMidRight]But Chief...[A]
64. [OpenMidLeft]You seem to have learned much
65. during your travels.[A]
66. I'm already too old to change my way
67. of thinking.[A]
68. But you are still young.[A]
69. It is your responsibility to lead
70. Sacae to a brighter future.[A]
71. This is an order from your Chief, Shin.[A]
72. It is up to you youths to decide Sacae's
73. fate.[A]
74. [OpenMidRight]Yes...[A]
75. [034D]
76. [OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x106][OpenMidRight][LoadFace][0x105][OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]Shin, are you all right?[A]
77. [OpenMidRight]What is the matter, Lady Sue?
78. You don't look well...[A]
79. [OpenMidLeft]I heard you were ambushed...[A]
80. [OpenMidRight]I'm not hurt, my Lady.[A]
81. [OpenMidLeft]...Shin, I want you to retreat to the
82. back lines.[A]
83. I will take over for you.[A]
84. [OpenMidRight]What are you saying, Lady Sue?
85. It should be the other way around![A]
86. [OpenMidLeft]I've made up my mind.
87. You're going to step back.[A]
88. [OpenMidRight]But...[A]
89. [OpenMidLeft]Retreat to the back lines, Shin!
90. This is an order.[A]
91. [OpenMidRight]Is something wrong?
92. You're not acting like yourself.[A]
93. [OpenMidLeft]...Everyone...
94. They were all killed by Bern...[A]
95. I couldn't even track down the traitor
96. in our ranks, and...they were all killed,[A]
97. right in front of my eyes...[A]
98. I was helpless, Shin.[A]
99. I don't want that feeling again.
100. I don't want to lose you![A]
101. [OpenMidRight]Lady Sue...[A]
102. [OpenMidLeft]You must not die before I do.
103. Understood?[A]
104. [OpenMidRight]I was ordered to protect you, Lady Sue.
105. There is no way I would leave you and die.[A]
106. [OpenMidLeft]Do you promise?[A]
107. [OpenMidRight]I shall swear to our Father the Sky
108. and our Mother the Earth.[A]
109. [0350]
110. [OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x105][OpenMidRight][LoadFace][0x113][OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]You're...strange.[A]
111. [OpenMidRight]I...I am?[A]
112. [OpenMidLeft]Sacaean women rarely pick up weapons.
113. Even if they do, they would choose a bow.[A]
114. You would rarely see a girl pick up a sword.[A]
115. [OpenMidRight]Oh...[A]
116. [OpenMidLeft]And...[A]
117. Sacaean people worship the
118. Sky and Earth.[A]
119. You don't pray, and you don't
120. even belong to a clan...[A]

Traducteur FR. Traduis chaque ligne fidèlement en gardant toutes les balises ([A], [xxx], etc.) au bon endroit, sans en créer ni en supprimer. Utilise 'E' au lieu de 'É' et 'A' au lieu de 'À' (même en majuscules). Chaque ligne doit faire ≤ 45 caractères. Ajoute [A] à la fin de chaque réplique là où le joueur appuierait pour continuer. 1. I have never seen a Sacaean like
2. you before.[A]
3. [OpenMidRight]I-I'm sorry...[A]
4. [OpenMidLeft]No, I'm not accusing you.
5. I actually respect it.[A]
6. People can also live freely like you...
7. You've taught me a lesson.[A]
8. [OpenMidRight]I think you're exaggerating...[A]
9. But it feels nice to hear you
10. say that.[A]
11. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]You have beautiful eyes.[A]
12. [OpenMidRight]Wh-What?[A]
13. [OpenMidLeft]That must be because you're looking
14. straight ahead at your dream of[A]
15. mastering the sword.[A]
16. I will pray that your dream will
17. come true one day.[A]
18. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]Yes!
19. Thank you![A]
20. [0353]
21. [OpenMidRight][LoadFace][0x10C][ToggleSmile]Hmm...[A]
22. ...But why am I worrying so much
23. over him?[A]
24. ...I can't figure that out, either.[A]
25. [ToggleMouthMove]Anyway.[A]
26. [ToggleMouthMove]I have to figure out a way to talk
